alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tipton, central Lauderdale and west central Haywood Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ft Pillow, or 7 miles southwest of Ripley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ripley, Henning, Edith, Orysa, Durhamville, Luckett, Three Point, Flippin, Opossum, Lightfoot, Glimp, Arp and Rialto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
